text: geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : gabeuliel-eul jeog(jeog)eulo dugo issneun jaga issdamyeon sillo geu(gabeuliel)neun hananim-ui heolag-e uihae geugeos(kkulan)eul geudae ma-eum-e naelin geos-ila. geugeos-eun geu ijeon-ui geos-eul hwagjeunghaneun geos-imyeo midneun jadeul-eul wihan indowa gippeum-ui sosig-ila
